current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To enhance transparency for certain surveillance programs
		  authorized by the Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Act of 1978 and for other
		  purposes.

Nothing in this section or the amendments made by this section shall be construed—
to authorize the collection of any additional information, other than public demographic data, for the purpose of complying with the reporting requirements of this section; or
to authorize an amount of additional appropriations to carry out this section that is more than the amount authorized for that purpose for fiscal year 2013.
